ai-pp1.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-pp1.1:2.2_0: So what is known as the aggregates, and what is known as truth.
ai-pp1.1:3.1_0: How do you define the aggregates?
ai-pp1.1:3.3_0: form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-pp1.1:3.4_0: In this point there is what’s known as the aggregates.
ai-pp1.1:4.1_0: How do you define the sense fields?
ai-pp1.1:4.3_0: eye and sights, ear and sounds, nose and smells, tongue and tastes, body and touches.
ai-pp1.1:4.4_0: this is how to define the dimension of infinite space.
ai-pp1.1:5.1_0: How do we define the elements of an element?
ai-pp1.1:5.3_0: The eye element, sight element, and eye consciousness element. The ear element, sound element, and ear consciousness element. The nose element, smell element, and nose consciousness element. The tongue element, taste element, and tongue consciousness element. The body element, touch element, and body consciousness element. The mind element, thought element, and mind consciousness element.
ai-pp1.1:5.4_0: this is how to define the elements.
ai-pp1.1:6.1_0: How do you define the truth?
ai-pp1.1:6.3_0: It’s really true that this is the origin of suffering,
ai-pp1.1:6.4_0: this is how to define the truth of the truth.
ai-pp1.1:7.1_0: How do you define the faculties of the faculties?
ai-pp1.1:7.2_0: The faculties of awakening factors as far as the scope of the logic extend:
ai-pp1.1:7.3_0: The faculties of the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.
ai-pp1.1:7.4_0: this is how the faculties are known.
ai-pp1.1:8.1_0: survive imagining this person can be laid down to rest.
ai-pp1.1:10.1_0: Except if there is not in vain,
ai-pp1.1:11.1_0: angry and hostile, to disturbed suspicious sus suspicious reversible and unfit to stand:
ai-pp1.1:20.1_0: Seeing danger where there is none,
ai-pp1.1:25.1_0: When the message has been put down
